name: Twilight Town: A Cyberpunk Day In Life
name_original: Twilight Town: A Cyberpunk Day In Life
description:
Story:
You play as Ikuro, a gambling addict looking to fuel his other addiction to his personalized A.I robot wife. But of course, other unexpected things happen along the way in this town of eternal twilight...

Features:
-Relaxing OST!
-Gorgeous, animated graphics and sprites!
-Gripping, dark narrative!
-Colorful and well written characters!
